ðŸ“– Summary: MK DroidScreenCast is a Python-based application that provides full access to an Android smartphone via ADB and Scrcpy. It offers both a command-line interface (CLI) and a web-based panel for managing and streaming the Android device's screen to a PC over USB or Wi-Fi.
